name: @embrace-io/react-native-tracer-provider
description: A React Native for the Embrace SDK that conforms to the OpenTelemetry TracerProvider interface
author: Embrace <support@embrace.io> (https://embrace.io/)

scripts.android:test: node update_android_version.ts && cd native-src && yarn install && cd android && ./gradlew :app:detekt && ./gradlew :app:testDebugUnitTest && cd ../../
scripts.ios:install: cd native-src && yarn install && cd ios && pod install && rm .xcode.env.local
scripts.ios:test: (set -o pipefail && xcodebuild test -workspace native-src/ios/ReactNativeTracerProvider.xcworkspace -scheme ReactNativeTracerProvider -sdk $IOS_TEST_SDK -enableCodeCoverage YES -destination "platform=$IOS_TEST_PLATFORM,name=$IOS_TEST_DEVICE,OS=$IOS_TEST_OS" | xcbeautify)
